alert.note: Alert for Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 4:48PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Windham, central Tolland, south central Worcester and west central Providence Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 447 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coventry, or near Mansfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Windham, Willimantic, Killingly, Southbridge, Tolland, Coventry, Putnam, Thompson, Brooklyn, Woodstock, Willington, Columbia, Canterbury, Foster, Ashford, Pomfret, Chaplin, Hampton and Eastford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Connecticut...and central Massachusetts.
